docs.text: DVC Project Template DVC Project Template STEPS - Step 1 - Create a repository by using template repository Step 2 - Clone the new repository Step 3 - Create a conda environment after opening the repository in VSCODE conda create --prefix ./env python=3.7 -y conda activate ./env Step 4 - Install the requriments file pip install -r requirements.txt Step 5 - Initialized the dvc project dvc init Step 6 - commit and push the chnages to the remote repository
